content: Hi All, how would a 3rd party developer know the list logical ID for a request? Additionally, when the request is specific to a patient's current coverageplan, how is the connection suppose to be made between patient and list? The IG and reference app/server does not seem to be passing context in regards to a patient or associated coverages. Any help offered would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.

This is for the Formulary, right?
Don't know how to transfer....
@Saul Kravitz Yes, my mistake. Wrong stream. Sorry.
